solidstack.template
Class TemplateLoader

java.lang.Object
  solidstack.template.TemplateLoader

public class TemplateLoader
extends Object

Reads, compiles and caches the templates.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Constructor Detail

public TemplateLoader()
Constructor.

Method Detail

registerEncodingWriter

public void registerEncodingWriter(String mimeType,
                                   EncodingWriterFactory factory)
Registers a factory for an encoding writer for a specific MIME type.

Parameters:
mimeType - The MIME type to register the writer for.
factory - The factory for the writer.

registerMimeTypeMapping

public void registerMimeTypeMapping(String mimeType,
                                    String encodeAsMimeType)
Registers a MIME type mapping. The first MIME type will be written with the encoding writer of the second MIME type.

Parameters:
mimeType - The MIME type that should be mapped to the other MIME type.
encodeAsMimeType - The MIME type to map to.

setTemplatePath

public void setTemplatePath(String path)
Configures the path which acts as the root of the template files.

Parameters:
path - The path.

setReloading

public void setReloading(boolean reloading)
Enable or disable reloading. When enabled, the lastModified time stamp of the file is used to check if it needs reloading.

Parameters:
reloading - When true, the file is reloaded when updated.

setDefaultLanguage

public void setDefaultLanguage(String language)
Sets the default scripting language of the templates. This is used when the "language" directive is missing in the template.

Parameters:
language - The default scripting language of the templates.

getDefaultLanguage

public String getDefaultLanguage()
Returns the default scripting language of the templates.

Returns:
The default scripting language of the templates.

getTemplate

public Template getTemplate(String path)
Returns the compiled Template with the given path. Compiled templates are cached in memory. When setReloading(boolean) has been enabled, file change detection will cause the templates to be reloaded and recompiled.

Parameters:
path - The path of the template.
Returns:
The Template.

defineTemplate

public void defineTemplate(String path,
                           Resource resource)
Explicitly defines a new template. The compiled template is cached in memory and can be retrieved by calling getTemplate(String).

Parameters:
path - The path of the template.
resource - The resource containing the source of the template.

getWriterFactory

protected EncodingWriterFactory getWriterFactory(String mimeType)
Returns the encoding writer factory for the given MIME type. This method is called by Template.

Parameters:
mimeType - The MIME type to return the writer factory for.
Returns:
The encoding writer factory for the given MIME type.
